trans-unit.target: 刪除記錄檔，透過呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Delete%2A>會自動刪除該記錄檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: This can make other applications using that log inoperative.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓其他應用程式使用該記錄檔無法作業。

trans-unit.source: If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源已經對應到記錄檔，而且對應至新的記錄檔，您必須重新啟動電腦，變更才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The following example deletes a source from the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會從指定的電腦刪除的來源。

trans-unit.source: The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會決定其來源的記錄檔，然後再刪除記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: More than one source might write to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 多個來源可能會寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log.
trans-unit.target: 然後再刪除自訂的記錄檔，請確定沒有其他來源寫入該記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 參數是無效的。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <paramref name="source" /> parameter does not exist in the registry of the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定電腦的登錄中沒有 <paramref name="source" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
You do not have write access on the registry key for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有事件記錄檔登錄機碼的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> cannot be deleted because in the registry, the parent registry key for <paramref name="source" /> does not contain a subkey with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 無法刪除 <paramref name="source" />，因為在登錄中，<paramref name="source" /> 的父登錄機碼並未包含具有相同名稱的子機碼 (Subkey)。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> receives <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten" /> event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 是否接收 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten" /> 事件通知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> receives notification when an entry is written to the log; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 在項目寫入到記錄檔時接收通知，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> raises events when entries are written to the log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>屬性會決定是否<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>項目寫入記錄檔時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: When the property is `true`, components that receive the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event will receive notification any time an entry is written to the log that is specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若屬性是`true`，接收的元件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件將會收到通知隨時將項目會寫入記錄檔中指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> is `false`, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`false`，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can receive event notifications only when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 只有當項目寫入本機電腦上，您可以接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您無法接收通知的遠端電腦上寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event log is on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄位於遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: 結束對表單或為另一個元件所使用之 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化會於執行階段時執行。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]設計環境會使用這個方法來結束初始化用於表單或另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>方法初始化開始。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A>方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔的內容。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection" /> holding the entries in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 將項目保存在事件記錄檔中的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is associated with an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目與 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry" /> 類別的執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> member when reading from the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>時讀取事件記錄檔的成員。

trans-unit.source: Because the property is read-only, you cannot modify an entry or write to the log using <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為屬性是唯讀，則您無法修改項目，或寫入記錄檔使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> to write a new log entry.
trans-unit.target: 請改為指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>寫入新的記錄檔項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> to count the number of entries in the event log, and view each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>計數的事件記錄檔中的項目，並檢視每個<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the indexed <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A> member to retrieve information about a specific entry, such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A>成員，才能擷取資訊的特定項目，例如<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> when only reading from a log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>只讀取記錄時。

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> (server computer name) properties for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名稱和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>（伺服器電腦名稱） 的屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In either case, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> member is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>成員會自動填入的項目事件記錄檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can select the appropriate index for an item in this list to read individual entries.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取個別項目這份清單中選取適當的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: An important distinction between reading and writing log entries is that it is not necessary to explicitly call a read method.
trans-unit.target: 讀取和寫入記錄項目之間的一個重大差異是不需要明確地呼叫讀取的方法。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> are specified, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> property is automatically populated.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>都有指定，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>自動填入屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you change the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> property is repopulated the next time you read it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>屬性重新讀取它的下一次擴展之後。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果您要連接到記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer, ".", is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦中，"。"，會假設。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads entries in the event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取事件記錄檔中，「 MyNewLog 」，在本機電腦上的項目。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an entry is written to an event log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 發生於項目寫入至本機電腦上的事件記錄檔時。

trans-unit.source: To get event notifications, you must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得事件通知，您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can only receive event notifications when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 項目寫入本機電腦上時，您只可以接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您無法接收通知的遠端電腦上寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每當事件發生時，直到您移除委派，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The system responds to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> only if the last write event occurred at least six seconds previously.
trans-unit.target: 系統會回應至<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>才發生至少六秒之前的最後一個寫入事件。

trans-unit.source: This implies you will only receive one <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event notification within a six-second interval, even if more than one event log change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您只會收到一個<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>六秒的間隔內的事件通知，即使多個事件記錄的變更發生。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a sufficiently long sleep interval (around 10 seconds) between calls to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, you are less likely to miss an event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您插入夠長的睡眠狀態 （約 10 秒） 之間間隔呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，您不太可能會遺失事件。

trans-unit.source: However, if write events occur more frequently, you might not recieve the event notification until the next interval.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果寫入事件經常發生，您可能不會收到事件通知，直到下一個間隔。

trans-unit.source: Typically, missed event notifications are not lost, but delayed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，遺失的事件通知不會遺失，但延遲。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles an entry written event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理項目寫入事件。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified log exists.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的記錄檔是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能值包括：應用程式、安全性、系統、其他應用程式特定的記錄檔 (例如，與 Active Directory 關聯的記錄檔)，或者電腦上的任何自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 判斷記錄檔是否存在於本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the log exists on the local computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果記錄檔存在於本機電腦上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷本機電腦上是否有記錄檔中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on the local computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷來源是否存在的本機電腦上，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為本機電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，查詢會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if the specified `logName` already exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法在相同電腦上讓新的記錄檔的現有記錄檔名稱，建立新的記錄檔之前先使用此方法來判斷是否指定`logName`已存在於本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` parameter is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> 是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫此類別本身。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The logName is <see langword="null" /> or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: logName 是 <see langword="null" /> 或者是空值。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: The log for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能值包括：應用程式、安全性、系統、其他應用程式特定的記錄檔 (例如，與 Active Directory 關聯的記錄檔)，或者電腦上的任何自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to search for the log, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上搜尋記錄檔的電腦的名稱，或者表示本機電腦的 "."。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 判斷記錄檔是否存在於指定的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the log exists on the specified computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果記錄檔存在於指定的電腦上，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷遠端電腦上是否有記錄檔中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on a remote computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷來源是否存在的遠端電腦上，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the specified computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為指定電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，查詢會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if one with the specified `logName` already exists on the server specified by the `machineName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法在相同電腦上讓新的記錄檔的現有記錄檔名稱，建立新的記錄檔之前使用這個方法來判斷是否有一個具有指定`logName`已存在於所指定的伺服器上`machineName`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`和`machineName`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> 是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫此類別本身。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create a new instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 參數是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have used proper syntax for the computer on which you are searching.
trans-unit.target: 確認要搜尋的電腦採用的適合的語法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="logName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="logName" /> 是 <see langword="null" /> 或者是空值。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of the event logs.
trans-unit.target: 建立事件記錄檔的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the local computer and creates an array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋本機電腦上的所有事件記錄檔，並建立含有清單的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> that represents the logs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示本機電腦上記錄檔的類型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the local computer when the call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is made.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件是在本機電腦上的所有事件記錄檔的快照集時呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>進行。

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 這不是動態的集合，所以不會反映的刪除或建立的即時記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 您應該確認陣列中的記錄存在才能讀取或寫入其中。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常包括至少三個記錄檔： 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the local computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在本機電腦上建立的自訂記錄檔，它們會出現在陣列中。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的事件記錄檔清單，您必須使用適當的登錄權限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些權限是相同的呼叫所需<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉本機電腦上定義的事件記錄檔，並顯示每個事件記錄檔的組態詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: You do not have read access to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有讀取登錄的權限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is no event log service on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 電腦上沒有事件記錄檔服務。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: The computer on which to search for event logs.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上搜尋事件記錄檔的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the given computer and creates an array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定電腦上的所有事件記錄檔，並建立含有清單的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> that represents the logs on the given computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定電腦上記錄檔的類型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter when the call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is made.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件是所指定的電腦上的所有事件記錄檔的快照集`machineName`參數時呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>進行。

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 這不是動態的集合，所以不會反映的刪除或建立的即時記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 您應該確認陣列中的記錄存在才能讀取或寫入其中。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常包括至少三個記錄檔： 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the specified computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的電腦上建立的自訂記錄檔，它們會出現在陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> 是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>類別本身。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object to make a call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件，讓方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的事件記錄檔清單，您必須使用適當的登錄權限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些權限是相同的呼叫所需<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets a list of logs on the computer "myServer".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得在電腦"myServer"上的記錄檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: It then outputs the name of each log.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會輸出每個記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is an invalid computer name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 參數是無效的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: You do not have read access to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有讀取登錄的權限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is no event log service on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 電腦上沒有事件記錄檔服務。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the log to read from or write to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要讀取或寫入的事件記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log.
trans-unit.target: 記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be Application, System, Security, or a custom log name.
trans-unit.target: 可以是應用程式、系統、安全性或者自訂的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Three log files exist by default on the server: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，在伺服器上的三個記錄檔存在： 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services use the Application log file.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務使用的應用程式記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers use the System log file.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式會使用系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The system generates success and failure audit events in the Security log when auditing is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 開啟稽核時，系統會產生成功和失敗稽核事件安全性記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: If you have other applications installed, like Active Directory on Windows servers, there might be other default log files.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有其他安裝，例如 Windows 伺服器上的 Active Directory 的應用程式可能會有其他預設的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can create custom log files on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以建立自訂記錄檔的本機或遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Custom logs help organize your entries in a more detailed way than is allowed when your components write events to the default Application log.
trans-unit.target: 自訂記錄檔可協助組織更詳細的方式與您的元件會將事件寫入預設應用程式記錄檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Log names are limited to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 記錄檔名稱會限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: According to the system, MyLogSample1 and MyLogSample2 are the same log.
trans-unit.target: 根據系統 MyLogSample1 和 MyLogSample2 是相同的記錄。

trans-unit.source: If you write to an event log, it is not enough to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您寫入事件記錄檔時，它是不夠的指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You must associate a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property with your event log resource to connect it to a particular log.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>以將它連接到特定的記錄檔事件記錄檔資源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> when only reading from a log, but an event source must be associated with the event log resource in the server's registry.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>只讀取記錄檔，但事件來源時必須與伺服器的登錄中的事件記錄檔資源相關聯。

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> (server computer name) to read from it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名稱和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>從中讀取的 （伺服器電腦名稱）。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果您要連接到記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property has not been specified, a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> returns an empty string if <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> has not been explicitly set (by setting the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property, or through the constructor).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>未指定屬性，呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>傳回空字串，如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>尚未明確設定 (藉由設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性，或透過建構函式)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> has been specified, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> returns the name of the log to which that source was registered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>已指定，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>傳回該來源註冊所在的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A source can only be registered to one log at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一次只有一個記錄檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property was set for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>, you cannot change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property for that <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> without changing the value of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> or calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>的執行個體已設定屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>，您無法變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>該屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>而不需要變更的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>或呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>第一次。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property after the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property has been set, writing a log entry throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性之後<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性已設定，寫入記錄項目就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The operating system stores event logs as files.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統會將事件記錄檔儲存為檔案。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>若要建立新的事件記錄檔，相關聯的檔案儲存在指定的電腦上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property with the ".evt" file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱由所附加的前 8 個字元設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>副檔名".evt"檔案名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create a new log using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property alone (without specifying a source for the log).
trans-unit.target: 您無法建立新的記錄檔使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性 （而未指定記錄檔的來源）。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>, passing in a new log name as a parameter, and then call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>、 傳入新的記錄檔名稱做為參數，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, the intent is usually either to create (and write entries to) new application-specific logs, or to read from existing logs.
trans-unit.target: 不過，其目的通常是要建立 （和寫入項目） 新應用程式特定的記錄檔，或從現有的記錄檔讀取。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> value changes, the event log is closed and all event handles are released.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>值變更，關閉事件記錄檔，且會釋放所有的事件控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property to the name of a log that does not exist, the system attaches the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to the Application log, but does not warn you that it is using a log other than the one you specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性不存在的記錄檔的名稱，系統會將附加<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>應用程式記錄檔中，但不會警告您它正在使用您所指定的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads entries in the event log, "NewEventLog", on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取事件記錄檔中，「 NewEventLog 」，在本機電腦上的項目。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the event log's friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: A name that represents the event log in the system's event viewer.
trans-unit.target: 名稱，表示系統的事件檢視器中的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista and later, users do not have permission to access the security log.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，使用者沒有存取安全性記錄檔的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are running Windows Vista or later as a user, you will get a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> when you attempt to access the display name for an event in the security log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在執行 Windows Vista 或更新版本做為使用者，您會收到<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>當您嘗試存取安全性記錄檔中事件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼存取安全性記錄檔，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer and displays the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.LogDisplayName%2A> for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉本機電腦上定義的事件記錄檔，並顯示<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.LogDisplayName%2A>每個事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> does not exist in the registry for this computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> 不存在這部電腦的登錄中。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the specified registry key.
trans-unit.target: 讀取指定的登錄機碼的功能。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.RegistryPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the specified registry key if it is a remote key.
trans-unit.target: 能夠存取指定的登錄鍵，如果它是遠端的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to look, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上搜尋記錄檔的電腦的名稱，或者表示本機電腦的 "."。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the log to which the specified source is registered.
trans-unit.target: 取得登錄指定來源的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log associated with the specified source in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 與登錄中指定的來源關聯的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logs the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是應用程式的名稱或名稱的子元件的應用程式，如果應用程式很大。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new source, which can only write to one log at a time, the system registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立新的來源，可以只撰寫一個記錄檔一次，則系統會登錄事件記錄檔與您的應用程式項目的有效來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property can be any string, but the name cannot be used by other sources on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性可以是任何字串，但無法使用其他電腦上的來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to create a duplicated <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> value throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立重複的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: However, a single event log can have many different sources writing to it.
trans-unit.target: 不過，單一的事件記錄檔可以有許多不同的來源寫入。

trans-unit.source: The following example deletes a source from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會從本機電腦刪除的來源。

trans-unit.source: The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會決定其來源的記錄檔，然後再刪除記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: More than one source might write to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 多個來源可能會寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log.
trans-unit.target: 然後再刪除自訂的記錄檔，請確定沒有其他來源寫入該記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which to read or write events.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在其上讀取或寫入事件的電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server on which the event log resides.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔所在處的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 預設值是本機電腦 (".")。

trans-unit.source: If you write to an event log, you must associate a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> with your event log object to connect it to a particular log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您寫入事件記錄檔，您必須使<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>與您的事件記錄檔物件，將它連接到特定的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property when only reading from a log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性只會讀取記錄時。

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> (server computer name).
trans-unit.target: 您可以只指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名稱和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>（伺服器電腦名稱）。

trans-unit.source: You need not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果您要連接到記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。

trans-unit.source: A source can only be registered to one log at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一次只有一個記錄檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property was set for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>, you cannot change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property for that <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> without changing the value of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> or calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>的執行個體已設定屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>，您無法變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>該屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>而不需要變更的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>或呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>第一次。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> closes all handles and reattaches to the log and source on the new computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>關閉所有控制代碼，並附加記錄檔和新的電腦上的來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> value cannot be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>值不可為空字串。

trans-unit.source: If it is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 若未明確設定，則預設為本機電腦 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads entries in the event log, "NewEventLog", on a specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取事件記錄檔中，「 NewEventLog"，指定電腦上的項目。

trans-unit.source: The computer name is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 電腦名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum event log size in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大事件記錄檔大小 (以 KB 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum event log size in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 最大事件記錄檔大小 (以 KB 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 512, indicating a maximum file size of 512 kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 512，表示最大記錄檔大小為 512 KB。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A> property represents the size limit of the event log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A>屬性表示事件記錄檔的大小限制。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches the size limit, the configured <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> value determines whether new entries are discarded, or whether new entries overwrite older entries.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小限制，設定的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>值決定是否會捨棄新的項目，或新的項目是否覆寫較舊的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示這個執行個體所代表的事件記錄檔的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小上限時，此屬性會指定作業系統如何處理新的項目寫入事件記錄檔已註冊的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉本機電腦上定義的事件記錄檔，並顯示每個事件記錄檔的組態詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than 64, or greater than 4194240, or not an even multiple of 64.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 64 或大於 4194240，或者不是 64 的偶數倍數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> value is not a valid log name.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> 值不是有效的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the target computer.
trans-unit.target: 無法在目標電腦上開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of days to retain entries in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔項目的保留天數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days that entries in the event log are retained.
trans-unit.target: 保留事件記錄檔項目的天數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 7.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 7。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> property to examine the current setting for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>屬性可檢查事件記錄檔的目前設定。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> to change the minimum number of days that each entry in the event log must be retained.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>變更最小數目的事件記錄檔中的每個項目必須保留的天數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> value depends on the configured overflow behavior of the event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>值取決於設定的溢位行為的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded>, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded>，然後在<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>值為 0。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>，然後在<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>值為-1。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder>, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> value is greater than zero, and represents the number of days to retain event log entries when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder>，然後在<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>值小於或等於零，並代表的事件記錄檔項目的事件記錄檔已滿時保留的天數。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior only occurs when an event log reaches its size limit.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔達到大小限制時，才會發生溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> has its <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder>, and the event log reaches its maximum size, then new entries are written only if they can replace entries whose age exceeds the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> period.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>具有其<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>設<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder>，和事件記錄檔達到大小上限，則新的項目寫入只可以取代項目，其時間超過<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>期間。

trans-unit.source: Retaining event entries for a minimum period is appropriate when the event log is archived regularly.
trans-unit.target: 保留的最小週期的事件項目時，適當的事件記錄檔會定期封存。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you risk losing new entries when the event log reaches its limit.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就可能會遺失事件記錄檔達到限制時的新項目。

trans-unit.source: To avoid losing new event information, set the minimum retention days for events based on your archive schedule for a particular event log.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免遺失新的事件資訊，請設定根據特定的事件記錄檔的封存排程事件的最小保留天數。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉本機電腦上定義的事件記錄檔，並顯示每個事件記錄檔的組態詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior for writing new entries to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目寫入事件記錄檔的溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of days each event log entry is retained.
trans-unit.target: 每一個事件記錄檔項目會保留的最小天數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only if <c>action</c> is set to <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 <c>action</c> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder" /> 時，才會使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: Changes the configured behavior for writing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達最大檔案大小時，變更寫入新項目的已設定行為。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior for an event log specifies what happens when new entries are to be written to a log that has reached its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔的溢位行為會指定要寫入的記錄檔已達到其最大檔案大小，新的項目時，會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為在事件記錄檔達到檔案大小上限時，才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為不會影響新的項目寫入記錄檔可容納額外的事件記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method configures the overflow behavior of an event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法會設定事件記錄檔的溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method for the event log specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> property values reflect the newly configured overflow behavior.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法所指定的事件記錄檔後<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>屬性值會反映新設定的溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示這個執行個體所代表的事件記錄檔的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小上限時，此屬性會指定作業系統如何處理新的項目寫入事件記錄檔已註冊的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded> to indicate that a new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded>表示新項目會覆寫舊的項目時<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>達到最大值。

trans-unit.source: If the `action` parameter is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded>, the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`action`參數設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded>、`retentionDays`參數值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder> to indicate that each new entry overwrites older entries when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder>來表示，每個新的項目會覆寫舊的項目時<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>達到最大值。

trans-unit.source: Specify the number of days that events must be retained in the log using the `retentionDays` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定在記錄檔中使用的事件必須保留的天數`retentionDays`參數。

trans-unit.source: Events written within the retention range are not overwritten by new entries.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目不會覆寫的保留範圍內寫入的事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite> to discard new events when the maximum log size is reached.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>捨棄新的事件，當達到最大記錄檔大小。

trans-unit.source: If the `action` parameter is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>, the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`action`參數設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>、`retentionDays`參數值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Setting the overflow policy to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite> specifies that new entries are discarded when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: 將溢位原則設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite>指定事件記錄檔已滿時，就會捨棄新的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you use this setting, ensure the event log is regularly archived and cleared to avoid reaching its maximum size limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用此設定，請確定事件記錄檔定期封存和清除，以避免達到其大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the configured overflow policy for a specified event log, and allows the user to select a new overflow policy setting for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示針對指定的事件記錄檔中，設定的溢位原則，並允許使用者選取新的溢位原則設定事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="action" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="retentionDays" /> is less than one, or larger than 365.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="retentionDays" /> 小於 1 或大於 365。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> value is not a valid log name.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> 值不是有效的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the target computer.
trans-unit.target: 無法在目標電腦上開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the configured behavior for storing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum log file size.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達最大記錄檔大小時，取得儲存新項目的已設定行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction" /> value that specifies the configured behavior for storing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum log size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction" /> 值，指定當事件記錄檔到達最大記錄檔大小時，儲存新項目的已設定行為。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder" />。

trans-unit.source: Event logs grow in size as new events are written to them.
trans-unit.target: 在新的事件會寫入事件記錄檔大小變大。

trans-unit.source: Each event log has a configured maximum size limit; the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A> property defines the maximum number of kilobytes allowed for the event log file size.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件記錄檔已設定的最大大小的限制;<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A>屬性會定義事件記錄檔大小所允許的 kb 數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> property value to examine the configured overflow behavior for an event log at its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>來檢查事件記錄檔，在其大小上限設定溢位行為的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method to change the overflow behavior for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法，以變更事件記錄檔的溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為在事件記錄檔達到檔案大小上限時，才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為不會影響新的項目寫入記錄檔可容納額外的事件記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉本機電腦上定義的事件記錄檔，並顯示每個事件記錄檔的組態詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: The fully specified path to a localized resource file.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化資源檔的完整指定路徑。

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier that indexes a localized string within the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，可為資源檔內的當地語系化字串編排索引。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the localized name of the event log, which is displayed in the server Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件記錄檔的當地語系化名稱，這會顯示在伺服器的 [事件檢視器] 中。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A> to register and display a localized name in the Event Viewer for custom event logs.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A>登錄和自訂事件記錄檔的事件檢視器中顯示的當地語系化的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified resource identifier must correspond to a localized string defined in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資源識別碼必須對應到資源檔中定義的當地語系化字串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the custom event log name using the localized string and the current culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示使用當地語系化的字串和目前的文化特性設定的自訂事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can define multiple event log names localized for different cultures in your resource file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以定義多個資源檔中的不同文化特性的當地語系化的事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the localized string corresponding to the culture settings of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示對應到目前使用者的文化特性設定當地語系化的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the Event Viewer cannot load the localized string from the resource file, or if no display name was registered for the event log, then the Event Viewer displays the event log name defined in <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件檢視器無法從資源檔，載入當地語系化的字串，或如果沒有顯示名稱已註冊的事件記錄檔，事件檢視器顯示中定義的事件記錄檔名稱<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to register a display name for the pre-defined event logs.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要註冊預先定義的事件記錄檔的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The operating system registers the localized display names for the Application, System, and Security event logs.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統會註冊應用程式、 系統及安全性事件記錄檔的當地語系化的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷事件來源是否命名`SampleApplicationSource`註冊本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`.
trans-unit.target: 最後，範例會設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`和中的資源檔案路徑`messageFile`。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, resource identifier 5001 is defined for the localized name of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，資源識別碼 5001 定義事件記錄檔的當地語系化名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> value is not a valid log name.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log" /> 值不是有效的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the target computer.
trans-unit.target: 無法在目標電腦上開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceFile" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resourceFile" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for administering event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 管理電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source name to register and use when writing to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定寫入至事件記錄檔時登錄和使用的來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name registered with the event log as a source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱 (具有事件記錄檔)，被登錄為項目的來源。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logs the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是應用程式的名稱或名稱的子元件的應用程式，如果應用程式很大。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You only need to specify an event source if you are writing to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定事件來源，如果您要撰寫事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events.
trans-unit.target: 之前將項目寫入事件記錄檔，您必須與事件記錄檔登錄事件來源為有效的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: When you write a log entry, the system uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫的記錄項目時，系統會使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>来尋找適當的記錄檔，在其中放置項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>, or a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在閱讀事件記錄檔，您可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果您要連接到本機電腦上的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> to write events to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>將事件寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定事件來源寫入事件。您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立現有的事件記錄檔或新的事件記錄檔事件來源。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立新的事件記錄檔的新來源時，系統會註冊為該記錄檔中，來源，但寫入第一個項目之前，不會建立記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name.
trans-unit.target: 來源必須為本機電腦上唯一新的來源名稱不符合現有的來源名稱或現有的事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個事件記錄檔可以寫入每個來源一次。不過，您的應用程式可以使用多個來源來寫入多個事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> value, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to which it is registered is closed and all event handles are released.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>來登錄它已關閉，且會釋放所有的事件控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更現有來源的設定詳細資料，您必須刪除來源，並再建立使用新的設定。

trans-unit.source: If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他應用程式或元件使用現有的來源，請使用更新的組態，而不會刪除現有的來源建立新的來源。

trans-unit.source: If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源已經對應到記錄檔，而且對應至新的記錄檔，您必須重新啟動電腦，變更才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立來源`MySource`如果它不存在，並將項目寫入事件記錄檔`MyNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱產生的登錄機碼路徑長度超過 254 個字元。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Searches a computer's registry for a given event source.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定事件來源的電腦的登錄。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event source is registered on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 判斷事件來源是否登錄於本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event source is registered on the local computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源登錄於本機電腦上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷事件來源是否存在於本機電腦上使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a log exists on the local computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷記錄檔是否存在的本機電腦上，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為本機電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜尋的事件來源在 Windows Vista 和更新版本或 Windows Server 2003，您必須具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 這項需求的原因是，必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性、 以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: A service that is executing under the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem> account does not have the privileges required to execute this method.
trans-unit.target: 服務正在執行下<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem>帳戶沒有執行這個方法所需的權限。

trans-unit.source: The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>, and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer.
trans-unit.target: 解決方法是檢查 事件來源是否存在於<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>，而且如果它不存在，安裝程式中建立的來源。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法讓新的來源的同一部電腦上現有的來源名稱，然後再嘗試使用這個方法來呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>，確保來源所指定的名稱與`source`不存在本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The `source` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `source`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立來源`MySource`如果它不存在，並將項目寫入事件記錄檔`MyNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> was not found, but some or all of the event logs could not be searched.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="source" />，但無法搜尋部分或全部的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入在電腦上的事件記錄檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name the computer on which to look, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上進行尋找的電腦的名稱，或者表示本機電腦的 "."。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event source is registered on a specified computer.
